verses.verse: Then answered <S%H6030><s%> Zophar <S%H6691><s%> the Naamathite <S%H5284><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%>,
Should not the multitude <S%H7230><s%> of words <S%H1697><s%> be answered <S%H6030><s%>? And should a man <S%H376><s%> full of talk <S%H8193><s%> be justified <S%H6663><s%>?
Should thy boastings <S%H907><s%> make <S%H2790><s%> men <S%H4962><s%> hold their peace <S%H2790><s%>? And when thou mockest <S%H3932><s%>, shall no man make thee ashamed <S%H3637><s%>?
For thou sayest <S%H559><s%>, My doctrine <S%H3948><s%> is pure <S%H2134><s%>, And I am clean <S%H1249><s%> in thine eyes <S%H5869><s%>.
But <S%H199><s%> oh that <S%H5414><s%> God <S%H433><s%> would speak <S%H1696><s%>, And open <S%H6605><s%> his lips against thee <S%H8193><s%>,

And that he would show <S%H5046><s%> thee the secrets <S%H8587><s%> of wisdom <S%H2451><s%>! For he is manifold <S%H3718><s%> in understanding <S%H8454><s%>. Know <S%H3045><s%> therefore that God <S%H433><s%> exacteth <S%H5382><s%> of thee less than thine iniquity deserveth <S%H5771><s%>.
Canst thou by searching <S%H2714><s%> find out <S%H4672><s%> God <S%H433><s%>? Canst thou find <S%H4672><s%> out the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> unto perfection <S%H8503><s%>?
It is high <S%H1363><s%> as heaven <S%H8064><s%>; what canst thou do <S%H6466><s%>? Deeper <S%H6013><s%> than Sheol <S%H7585><s%>; What canst thou know <S%H3045><s%>?
The measure <S%H4055><s%> thereof is longer <S%H752><s%> than the earth <S%H776><s%>, And broader <S%H7342><s%> than the sea <S%H3220><s%>.
If he pass through <S%H2498><s%>, and shut up <S%H5462><s%>, And call <S%H6950><s%> unto judgment <S%H7725><s%>, then who can hinder him?
For he knoweth <S%H3045><s%> false <S%H7723><s%> men <S%H4962><s%>: He seeth <S%H7200><s%> iniquity <S%H205><s%> also <S%H995><s%>, even though he consider it not.
But vain <S%H5014><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is void of understanding <S%H3823><s%>, Yea <S%H120><s%>, man is born <S%H3205><s%> as a wild ass <S%H6501><s%>'s colt <S%H5895><s%>.
If thou set <S%H3559><s%> thy heart <S%H3820><s%> aright <S%H6566><s%>, And stretch out thy hands toward him <S%H3709><s%>;
If iniquity <S%H205><s%> be in thy hand <S%H3027><s%>, put it far away <S%H7368><s%>, And let not unrighteousness <S%H5766><s%> dwell <S%H7931><s%> in thy tents <S%H168><s%>.
Surely then shalt thou lift up <S%H5375><s%> thy face <S%H6440><s%> without spot <S%H3971><s%>; Yea <S%H3332><s%>, thou shalt be stedfast, and shalt not fear <S%H3372><s%>:
For thou shalt forget <S%H7911><s%> thy misery <S%H5999><s%>; Thou shalt remember <S%H2142><s%> it as waters <S%H4325><s%> that are passed away <S%H5674><s%>,
And thy life <S%H2465><s%> shall be clearer <S%H6965><s%> than the noonday <S%H6672><s%>; Though there be darkness <S%H5774><s%>, it shall be as the morning <S%H1242><s%>.

And thou shalt be secure <S%H982><s%>, because there is <S%H3426><s%> hope <S%H8615><s%>; Yea <S%H2658><s%>, thou shalt search about thee <S%H7901><s%>, and shalt take thy rest in safety <S%H983><s%>.
Also thou shalt lie down <S%H7257><s%>, and none shall make thee afraid <S%H2729><s%>; Yea <S%H7227><s%>, many shall make suit <S%H2470><s%> unto thee <S%H6440><s%>.

But the eyes <S%H5869><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> shall fail <S%H3615><s%>, And they shall have no way to flee <S%H6><s%>; And their hope <S%H8615><s%> shall be the giving up <S%H4646><s%> of the ghost <S%H5315><s%>.
